answers.answer: Mine took a little over 4. I did it today. Not fun. Did you fail the 3 hr? Where are you from?

I took the 3 hour yesterday,  im just waiting to hear back about results.  When they drew my blood at the 2 hour mark, the lady said if I didnt pass this then I would have to take the 5 hour test. I thought they stopped at 3 so it surprised me. I had never heard of any past 3 hours.
Ugh I'm dreading the glucose test. I have mine in 4 more weeks :/ never heard of 5hr though. If you fail they just have you retake it. But every ob is different
If u fail here in Australia, u just get given the blood glucose monitor for a couple of days to check at intervals then the doc advises if u need insulin. Try not to stress about it.

question: Is there such a thing? How often do they do this? I thought that usually the diagnosed gestational diabetes after the 3 hour test. Thanks in advance.
title: 5 hour glucose test
